   Could you get a citation for bringing a dildo to class?

By Dylan Baddour October 7, 2016

Dildo in University of Texas class could lead to a ticket, but would it?

"You would receive a citation for taking a DILDO to class before you would
   get in trouble for taking a gun to class," the entry said.

We emailed the University of Texas and asked if students would indeed
   receive a citation for taking a dildo to class, as school rules seemed to
   indicate.
